title: F - Novel Updates
tags: Divorce   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Gods   Kingdoms   Knights   Saving the World   Summoned Hero   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   World Travel   Zombies
author: Itomori Tamaki   糸森 環
description: Hibiki was a female high school student who was suddenly summoned to another world during her spring break. She was sent to a ruined world called “Evelier” by an existence named [Fate]. The knight Louie whom Hibiki saved is its only survivor, and he intends to fight alongside Hibiki, but…!?>
